website_summaries.verdict: This enamel toothpaste simultaneously whitens the teeth and reduces tooth sensitivity.
pros: Does not contain any artificial flavors or sweeteners
Specifically formulated to help re-harden enamel and replenish calcium
Includes tea tree oil, aloe, and other trusted natural ingredients
Provides a great toothpaste for both kids and adults
cons: Can be tough to get the toothpaste out of the tube

customer_reviews.title: Caution! Contains Xylitol which is fatal to dogs
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for cruelty free toothpaste and decided to try this. When I received it, I quickly noticed that it advertises the use of Xylitol as a sweetener. I NEVER keep anything with Xylitol in my house as it is HIGHLY toxic to dogs. Ingesting even a little Xylitol can be fatal to dogs. I immediately wanted to return it, but found that it is ineligible for return. So disappointing. I really wish that Xylitol would go out of fashion. I have 5 little dogs, so it just isn't worth the risk to keep the stuff in the house.
customer_reviews.author: AriasByMoonlight

customer_reviews.title: A Delight
customer_reviews.text: First time I tried this, my teeth felt clean from the dentist visit. Love it. Its not a chore, I enjoy brushing my teeth again. The “popular” toothpastes, I can feel buildup behind my teeth, that can only be removed by the dentist. I will never go back.
customer_reviews.author: Amdar

customer_reviews.title: Does what it's supposed to
customer_reviews.text: It works great! It really helps with tooth sensitivity and gives your mouth a clean feeling afterwards. And the flavor is nice and mild and refreshing. It has a nice texture and I am very well pleased with it. And I love the helpful ingredients for gum health as well. It's a lovely toothpaste that works.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: This is the only toothpaste I use. The ones from the big brands all have sulfate detergents in them, which can exacerbate cold sores, and cause them to happen more often. I've had far fewer problems since I switched over.
customer_reviews.author: Beth ATop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: My new go to!
customer_reviews.text: So happy I've subribed. The flavor is light but excellent. You won't find blasting freshness in a natural product. It can soften when it's very hot weather like chocolate melting hot & I think that's normal for a gel toothpaste.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only toothpaste I could find that has no SLS, does have flouride, and has enamel protecting ingredients. Perfect combination for my toothpaste needs. I like the flavor, too!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Helped my sensitivity!
customer_reviews.text: My teeth have suddenly become very sensitive. Last summer I randomly grabbed a tube of this at Marshall’s because I was looking for something natural to help with this issue. I’ve been using it consistently for over a year now and have had less to no sensitivity! I have this on subscribe and save and now will never run out! I even recommended it to another friend, gave her an extra tube, and now she’s buying it too!
customer_reviews.author: Alaina

customer_reviews.title: No clean feeling
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it's the enamel protectant, but never got that "clean" feeling, after using. Prefer their other toothpaste.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Best toothpaste by far for sensitive teeth!
customer_reviews.text: Switching to Enamel Xtra was the best dental decision I have made. Sensitivity is gone and overall mouth health is perfect. Toothpaste is a gel with a light minty flavor that is refreshing but not overpowering.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite toothpaste
customer_reviews.text: Great toothpaste. I've been using Kiss My Face for years and it is a terrific product.
customer_reviews.author: Book Collector

customer_reviews.title: Its ok!
customer_reviews.text: It's an ok toothpaste, but I will have to find another. I have sensitive teeth. It didn't help at all. My daughter didn't like the taste. I will keep. It since its almost a full tube just in case I run out.
customer_reviews.author: tippy

customer_reviews.title: Nice flavor.
customer_reviews.text: Am giving this a try. Want to know, why no mouthwash?
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Canale

customer_reviews.title: Enamel loss
customer_reviews.text: Really great for enamel loss. Not too harsh. Have to get used to taste. Got on accident at sprouts years ago and now actively looking for it
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Levinson

customer_reviews.title: Clean mouth
customer_reviews.text: I'm not much on gel but it worked fine. The taste wasnt over kill. But there wasn't much of a taste but did refresh my mouth
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Kuzniar

customer_reviews.title: One of a kind!
customer_reviews.text: This toothpaste is the best! It's cruelty free and has fluoride, which many cruelty free toothpastes don't have fluoride, but it's important for my teeth to keep them clean. I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Demetra Nicklow

customer_reviews.title: The best toothpaste ever!!
customer_reviews.text: We have been purchasing Kiss My Face tooth gel from Amazon since 2011. I usually have cavities & both my husband & have had to have teeth pulled, we no longer suffer with constant tooth pain. Our Dentist said at my last cavity free check-up, to keep using it, they're into natural products & were super impressed with Kiss My Face!! It tastes great & leaves mouth clean & minty fresh, I hate toothpaste that leaves bad taste in your mouth. I had purchased Whitening KMF before, the Enamel is equal in flavor and texture.
customer_reviews.author: Rebel Flower Girl

customer_reviews.title: Good toothpaste
customer_reviews.text: Love the flavor and functions as it is supposed to. Added enamel is a must for me!
customer_reviews.author: cla

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: very good works great on teeth, taste and everything is good
customer_reviews.author: Danial

customer_reviews.title: Minty fresh
customer_reviews.text: Very nice toothpaste without all the chemicals. Would be five stars if not so pricey. Unfortunately, it seems that all SLS-free toothpastes are double the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Danomatic

customer_reviews.title: Not fluoride free!!!
customer_reviews.text: Misleading, I was searching for a fluoride free gel toothpaste. I thought all of these were natural and fluoride free I was wrong. The extra enamel gel toothpaste has fluoride in it!!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well, as per my hygenists predictions, now need to see next check up results!
customer_reviews.author: Jacqui Leighton

customer_reviews.title: Don't feel like there is anything in this toothpaste that would benefit ...
customer_reviews.text: Don't feel like there is anything in this toothpaste that would benefit my teeth or enamel at all. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jacalyn Guitard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great tooth paste that has really helped with my plaque and gingivitis!!!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Best toothpaste ever!
customer_reviews.text: So I have super sensitive teeth, to the point I can't enjoy ice cream. I have tried all the top brand sensitivity toothpaste and none of them did the trick, I found this one at Marshall's once by chance and ever since then this is the only paste I will use. I can actually enjoy my cold and hot drinks without cringing now! It also has a nice flavor!
customer_reviews.author: Noemi Vera

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this toothpaste. It freashens my mouth and is supposed to save your enamel.
customer_reviews.author: lori

customer_reviews.title: Pleasing taste, some aftertaste, no foam .
customer_reviews.text: This toothpaste is recommended for those who are sensitive to sodium lauryl sulfate (SLS) in their toothpastes. My wife is among them. She used an entire tube of this product, and reports that it is just fine. There is little to no foaming action, unlike an SLS toothpaste like Crest or Colgate. The taste is pleasing, with a bit of a bitter natural mint aftertaste. The toothpaste works fine with our Braun electric tooth brush. The overall mouth feel after brushing is comparable to an SLS toothpaste. There is no salty aftertaste. Overall, someone switching from a traditional toothpaste would find the transition very easy. Except for the lack of foam, the experience is very much the same.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew T. Weflen

customer_reviews.title: Cruelty Free, Antioxidants and Tastes great
customer_reviews.text: Cruelty Free is important to me and this brand still honors that standard. Next: The mint is killer in this paste and does last a while too. The addition of the Tea Tree Oil, Aloe Vera, and Olive Leaf Extract are supposed to be the antioxidants in this.. and I must mention that I can feel the silica in the paste. Those are the little scrubbers and they certainly shouldn't bother your mouth at all; you just feel them in the texture of the paste. As for re-hardening enamel and replenish calcium? Don't know..like this toothpaste tho!
customer_reviews.author: lizardwitch

customer_reviews.title: Taste is good, price is OK, adds zest to your morning ritual.
customer_reviews.text: This toothpaste has a great taste that makes your whole mouth taste fresh and clean. Certainly starts your day with a ZING!. It is a green get and not a paste, like I am used to. My teeth felt clean but I haven't used this long enough to give any fantastic change in my mouth. However, I never expect much to be "fantastic" so I am quite satisfied with the use so far. There is no charge for a nicer smile. I did think the title of this gel was a little off the wall but I'm not an advertising exec.
customer_reviews.author: Will'o'the wisp

customer_reviews.title: Great toothpaste with great ingredients!
customer_reviews.text: This toothpaste has some great ingredients like olive leaf extract, tea tree oil, and aloe vera. It does not have harmful or otherwise unwanted ingredients that many toothpastes have such as triclosan, parabens, etc. It has a great mild mint taste. I have been using it for a couple of weeks now and my teeth are already less sensitive so it does do what it says. Overall a great product that I would definitely use again and again, the only drawback is that it is a bit too expensive for my current budget.
customer_reviews.author: dg419

customer_reviews.title: Great taste and clean well
customer_reviews.text: Kiss my face has always been a premium toothpaste, and the enamel extra is not different. You need twice the amount toothpaste with Tom's to get the same clean as this one. The taste is pleasant, and the tube squeezes clean. I suffer from occasional toothache from cold foods, and this helped as much as a round with Sensodyne. It was not as effective on my wife's extremely sensitive teeth though.
customer_reviews.author: John C

customer_reviews.title: Minty and fresh feeling.
customer_reviews.text: Kiss My Face's Enamel Extra toothpaste is a great toothpaste. It has the look and consistency of dark green Jello. It's not the most appealing looking toothpaste, but it has a great minty taste when brushing. The flavor lasts about an hour after brushing and my teeth feel and look clean. The only thing I would like changed is the screw-on cap, I prefer a flip top. All in all... a fine toothpaste.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Pantliano

customer_reviews.title: Contains flouride
customer_reviews.text: After you do your research on fluoride, you will know that it is not a necessary method of hardening your teeth and can also cause internal issues with your body. Otherwise, this toothpaste appears to be okay and even rather sweeter than other toothpastes that I've tried. If you don't mind using fluoride and want something a bit natural, then I guess this product sort of fills that niche.
customer_reviews.author: bandazar

customer_reviews.title: I don't have to quiver in fear of the loaded toothbrush :)
customer_reviews.text: Another kiss me face product that delivers - what a great brand! This toothpaste has left my teeth less sensitive after a week of use. It is better than some other major brands I have tried which work on/off I like the consistency - a hybrid paste/gel almost and it tastes great.
customer_reviews.author: StyleSnob

customer_reviews.title: Kiss My Face does it again!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using a toothpaste for sensitivity for a couple years now. Recently I tried the new Enamel Xtra from Kiss My Face. It claimed to reduce sensitivity. It not only reduced sensitivity........it stopped it cold! I have been using it now for about two weeks and can honestly say that I have NO sensitivity using this toothpaste. I don't know how this works but it does. I love the mild mint flavor and the ingredients. I can highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good natural toothpaste
customer_reviews.text: It tastes good and still has fluoride, which I wanted. The gel sticks well to the toothbrush and the whole thing (tube and actual paste) is easy to use. I have not used anything but conventional Colgate, so this was a switch. It doesn't foam up as much and doesn't have as strong a flavor. I am enjoying a more calming tooth brushing experience though.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Best All-Around Toothpaste!
customer_reviews.text: Love this new toothpaste from Kiss My Face! I have used their products for years, but haven't loved their toothpastes until now. This gel formula doesn't have any of the artificial or harmful ingredients (like what Kiss My Face stands for), yet my teeth feel clean like they do after a dental appointment! Love the fresh feeling and knowing that I'm not using a paste full of SLS, parabens, or triclosan. It's also helping with sensitivity that I have been having recently. Win-win!!
customer_reviews.author: K. L. Wyatt

customer_reviews.title: Like the mild flavor
customer_reviews.text: Like the mild flavor and cleaning. Does seem to help the enamel but the whitening was not very good, guess you can't have both.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: The taste is super clean, and it definitely feels like it strengthens ...
customer_reviews.text: The taste is super clean, and it definitely feels like it strengthens while it cleans. All natural toothpaste so you can't beat it.
customer_reviews.author: TINA

customer_reviews.title: but it didn't get it worse. but for sensitivity it's a must
customer_reviews.text: Really take care of sensitivity right away. I have been using it for 1 year now.i can not say that it rebuilt my enamel,but it didn't get it worse.but for sensitivity it's a must
customer_reviews.author: gwen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toothpaste
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that this toothpaste keeps my breath fresh for a long time. It is a mint toothpaste but its so strong that it burns your mouth. It's a subtle mint.
customer_reviews.author: Eromlig

customer_reviews.title: Natural product, no sensitivity
customer_reviews.text: My usual toothpaste is sensodyne because of my tooth sensitivity. I have been looking for a natural toothpaste alternative. This toothpaste fits the bill. I have not had any problems with sensitivity while using this paste, and it's great that it comes from Kiss My Face, a company that I trust.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: I love the taste and it works better than other sensitivity ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the taste and it works better than other sensitivity toothpastes. And it is great to know it doesn't have bad chemicals in it. I am so happy to find a healthy toothpaste that works well and tastes good!
customer_reviews.author: Esther V. Schreiber

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: Excellent new toothpaste from trusted KMF....great flavor (really!)...not too sweet or too minty. I like the gel consistency and find that it is helping my sensitive teeth. Very recommended
customer_reviews.author: lisa i steele

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: My daughter will use only all natural toothpaste and she loves this brand. Kiss My Face has a lot of nice products and this toothpaste is one of her favorites. Gel type paste has a good taste and does a nice job cleaning teeth. She feels better using something natural.
customer_reviews.author: E. Dempsey

product_meta.title: Kiss My Face Extra Gel Toothpaste, Enamel, 4.5 Ounce
product_meta.description: Style: enamel Xtra, fluoride size: 4.5 Ounce Kiss My Face Extra gel Toothpaste, enamel, 4.5 oz.
feature_bullets: Made with your satisfaction in mind

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
